def get_normal_vec_plane(p1, p2, p3):
    # These two vectors are in the plane
    v1 = p3 - p1
    v2 = p2 - p1
    # the cross product is a vector normal to the plane
    cp = np.cross(v1, v2)
    a, b, c = cp
    return a,b,c
